name: Bubble Shooter Ocean
description:
Bubble Bobble Ocean Bubble Shooter is an addictive bubble game with 80 puzzles levels packed of fun!

How to play:
★Match 3 bubbles to rescue kind fishes!
★Earn Coins at Each Level Completion!
★Use Coins to Get Power-Ups

Features:
★ Professional design
★ Addictive and fun to play, pop fast!
★ Pass level easily: 3 Special Power-Ups designed to ease Levels!
★ Aim easily: shoot bubble with long line.

This game will please anyone including family and kids
